name: FrogBouffet
description:
ENABLE FULLSCREEN

Made for the mini jam 79: frogs, with limitation: only one level;

It's a party game (multiplayer only) about catching the right food for your frog. Pressing Q, T, 1 or 3 will allow you to catch one of the flying objects. Try catching the right ones for your frog! you can find which ones to look for on the ground in front of your frog. 

How I used the limitation: Not only does the game have only one level, but it runs entirely on a single unity scene.
